title: RITO PLZ DO SOMETHING ABOUT YOUR BANNING SYSTEM.
body: Dear Riot, I recently played a ranked game with the most aggravating troll on the earth. He call top but top had already been called, goes jungle but jungle had already been called. SO IN THE END, i had to go support fiddlesticks. He then goes to my bot lane, feeds 7 times in 8 minutes. I want people like this banned as they ruin the fun experience of League BUT it seems like our reports on troll players seem to have no effect whatsoever. So please, take the time to consider you banning systems and make League a fun environment that is anti-salt and no trolling. Thank you
